editionStmt.edition: A new edition, with semantic markup, punctuation, accentuation, emendation, and notes.

respStmt.name: Bart Huelsenbeck and Alexander Loney, eds.
respStmt.resp: after the edition of H. Maehler; W. Müller; G. PoethkeArchiv für Papyrusforschung 24-25 (1976)13-26 (n° 2)

publicationStmt.publisher: The Center for Hellenic Studies of Harvard University

authority.name: Casey Dué and Mary Ebbott, edd.

div.head: Date
div.p: Early third century B.C. (Maehler, Müller, Poethke, 13)

item.bibl: van Thiel, H. 1996. Homeri Ilias Hildesheim: Olms.
Maehler, H.; Müller, W.; Poethke, G. 1976Archiv für Papyrusforschung 24-25pp. 13-26 (n° 2)

div.l: pla/zomai w(=d', e)pei\ ou)/ moi e)p' o)/mmasi nh/dumos u(/pnos
h)d' *ai)/anta taxu\n kai\ *fule/os a)/lkimon ui(o/n.
a)ll' ei)/ tis kai\ tou=sde metoixo/menos kale/seien
a)nti/qeo/n t' *ai)/anta kai\ *)iA diaeresis is visible here.domenh=a a)/nakta.
tw=n ga\r nh=es e)/asin e(kasta/tw, ou)de\ ma/l' e)ggu/s.
a)lla\ fi/lon per e)o/nta kai\ ai)doi=on *mene/laon
neike/sw, ei)/ pe/r moi nemesh/seai, ou)d' e)pikeu/sw,
a)lla/ me t' ei)soro/wn kai\ e)mh\n potide/gmenos o(rmh/n.
nu=n d' e)me/o pro/teros ma/l' e)pe/greto kai/ moi e)pe/sth:
to\n me\n e)gw\ proe/hka kalh/menai ou(\s su\ metalla=|s.
a)ll' i)/omen: kei/nous de\ kixhso/meqa pro\ pula/wn
e)n fula/kess', i(/na ga/r sfin e)pe/fradon h)gere/esqai."
to\n d' h)mei/bet' e)/peita *gerh/nios i(ppo/ta *ne/stwr:
"ou(/tws ou)/ ti/s oi( nemesh/setai ou)d' a)piqh/sei
*)argei/wn, o(/te ke/n tin' e)potru/nh| kai\ a)nw/gh|."
w(\s ei)pw\n e)/ndune peri\ sth/qessi xitw=na,
possi\ d' u(po\ liparoi=sin e)dh/sato kala\ pe/dila:
a)mfi\ d' a)/ra xlai=nan peronh/sato foiniko/essan,
diplh=n e)ktadi/hn, ou)/lh d' e)penh/noqe la/xnh:
ei(/leto d' a)/lkimon e)/gxos a)kaxme/non o)ce/i xalkw=|,
prw=ton e)/peit' *)odush=a *dii\ mh=tin a)ta/lanton
e)c u(/pnou a)ne/geire *gerh/nios i(ppo/ta *ne/stwr
fqegca/menos: to\n d' ai)=ya peri\ fre/nas h)/luq' i)wh/.
e)k d' h)=lqe klisi/hs kai/ sfeas pro\s mu=qon e)/eipe:
"ti/fq' ou(/tw kata\ nh=as a)na\ strato\n oi)=oi a)la=sqe
nu/kta di' a)mbrosi/hn, o(/ ti dh\ xreiw\ to/son i(/kei;"

ba\n d' e)pi\ *tudei/dhn *diomh/dea.A high punctus is visible here. to\n d'e)ki/xanon

o)/rq' e)pi\ saurwth=ros e)lh/lato, th=le de\ xalko\s
la/mf' w(/s te steroph\ patro\s *dio/s.A high punctus is visible here. au)ta\r o(/ g' h(/rws
eu(=d', u(po\ d' e)/strwto r(ino\n boo\s a)grau/loio,
au)ta\r u(po\ kra/tesfi ta/phs teta/nusto faeino/s.
to\n parsta\s a)ne/geire *gerh/nios i(A diaeresis is visible here.ppo/ta *ne/stwr,
la\c podi\ kinh/sas, w)/trune/ te nei/kese/ t' a)/nthn:

ou)k a)i/eis, w(s *trw=es e)pi\ qrwsmw=| pedi/oio

"*tudei/dh mh/t' a)/r me ma/l' ai)/neai:A high punctus is visible here. mhde/ ti nei/kei:
ei)do/si ga/r toi tau=ta met' *)argei/ois a)goreu/eis.
a)ll' i)/omen: ma/la ga\r nu\c a)/nutai, e)ggu/qi d' h)w/s,
a)/stra de\ dh\ probe/bhke, parw/xwken de\ ple/wn nu\c
tw=n du/o moira/wn, trita/th d' e)/ti moi=ra le/leiptai."
w(\s ei)po/nq' o(/ploisin e)/ni deinoi=sin e)du/thn.
*tudei/dhi me\n dw=ke menepto/lemos *qrasumh/dhs
fa/sganon a)/mfhkes: to\ d' e(o\n para\ nhi\ le/leipto:
kai\ sa/kos: a)mfi\ de/ oi( kune/hn kefalh=fin e)/qhke
taurei/hn, a)/falo/n te kai\ a)/llofon, h(/ te katai=tuc
ke/klhtai, r(u/etai de\ ka/rh qalerw=n ai)zhw=n.

kai\ ci/fos, a)mfi\ de/ oi( kune/hn kefalh=fin e)/qhke
r(inou= poihth/n: pole/sin d' e)/stosqen i(ma=sin

au)ta\r o(\ *mhrio/nhs dw=ken w(=| paidi\ forh=nai.
dh\ to/t' *)odussh=os pu/kasen ka/rh a)mfiteqei=sa.
tw\ d' e)pei\ ou)=n o(/ploisin e)/ni deinoi=sin e)du/thn,
ba/n r(' i)e/nai, lipe/thn de\ kat' au)to/qi pa/ntas a)ri/stous.
toi=si de\ decio\n h(=ken e)rwdio\n e)ggu\s o(doi=o
*palla\s *)aqhnai/h: toi\ d' ou)k i)/don o)fqalmoi=si
nu/kta di' o)rfnai/hn, a)lla\ kla/gcantos a)/kousan.
xai=re de\ tw=| o)/rniq' *)oduseu/s, h)ra=to d'An apostrophe is visible here. *)aqh/nh|:
e)n pa/ntessi po/noisi pari/stasai, ou)de/ se lh/qw
kinu/menos: nu=n au)=te ma/lista/ me fi/le' *)aqh/nh.
do\s de\ pa/lin e)pi\ nh=as e)uklei=as a)fike/sqai
r(e/cantas me/ga e)/rgon, o(/ ke *trw/essi melh/sh|."
deu/teros au)=t' h)ra=to boh\n a)gaqo\s *diomh/dhs:
"ke/kluqi nu=n kai\ e)mei=o, *dio\s te/kos *)atrutw/nh.

e)s *qh/bas, o(/te te pro\ *)axaiw=n a)/ggelos h)/|ei.
tou\s d' a)/r' e)p' *)aswpw=| li/pe xalkoxi/twnas *)axaiou/s,

kei=s': a)ta\r a)\y a)piw\n ma/la me/rmera mh/sato e)/rga
su\n soi\, di=a qea/, o(/te oi( pro/frassa pare/sths.
w(\s nu=n moi e)qe/lousa pari/staso kai/ me fu/lasse.
soi\ d' au)= e)gw\ r(e/cw bou=n h)=nin eu)rume/twpon
a)dmh/thn, h(\n ou)/ pw u(po\ zugo\n h)/gagen a)nh/r:
th/n toi e)gw\ r(e/cw xruso\n ke/rasin perixeu/as."
w(\s e)/fan eu)xo/menoi, tw=n d' e)/klue *palla\s *)aqh/nh.
oi(\ d' e)pei\ h)rh/santo *dio\s kou/rh| mega/loio,
